import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { saveData } from "../api/api"; const AddSnippet = ({ onChangeContent }) => { function handleAdd() { const selection = document.getElementById("snippet-language"); let selection_value = selection.value; const div_snippet = document.getElementById("container-snippet"); let snippet = ""; snippet = snippet.concat( "
", selection_value, "
" ); selection_value !== "" ? div_snippet.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", snippet) : document.getElementById("snippet-language").focus(); selection_value = ""; } function handleSubmit(event) { const selection = document.getElementById("snippet-language"); console.log(event.target.title.value); const data = [ { id: 1, image: "/Images/code.jpg", title: "Snippet ADD", description: "Lorem ", category: "ADD", codes: [ { id: 55, language: "55", code: "code 55", }, ], }, ]; } return ( <>

); }; export default AddSnippet;
